The DDPSC Maker Group is excited to announce that we will be hosting a Raspberry Jam, to show off your latest Maker projects. Register here! If you are interested in demonstrating your own projects don't hesitate to contact us through Twitter or through email (ddpsc.maker@gmail.com).The event is free to the public and will be held on Oct 03, 2015 at the Danforth Center (St. Louis, MO).
